# Домашнее задание к занятию "14.1 Создание и использование секретов"

## Задача 1: Работа с секретами через утилиту kubectl

```
erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl get secrets
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      21s

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl describe secret domain-cert
Name:         domain-cert
Namespace:    default
Labels:       <none>
Annotations:  <none>

Type:  kubernetes.io/tls

Data
====
tls.crt:  1944 bytes
tls.key:  3243 bytes

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
apiVersion: v1
data:
  tls.crt: 
  tls.key: 
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2022-08-05T15:11:39Z"
  name: domain-cert
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "2063253"
  uid: 9ff0830e-042d-472c-ad0d-25a356c7d544
type: kubernetes.io/tls

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "data": {
        "tls.crt": "",
        "tls.key": ""
    },
    "kind": "Secret",
    "metadata": {
        "creationTimestamp": "2022-08-05T15:11:39Z",
        "name": "domain-cert",
        "namespace": "default",
        "resourceVersion": "2063253",
        "uid": "9ff0830e-042d-472c-ad0d-25a356c7d544"
    },
    "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
}

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ cat secrets.json 
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "items": [
        {
            "apiVersion": "v1",
            "data": {
                "tls.crt": "",
                "tls.key": ""
            },
            "kind": "Secret",
            "metadata": {
                "creationTimestamp": "2022-08-05T15:11:39Z",
                "name": "domain-cert",
                "namespace": "default",
                "resourceVersion": "2063253",
                "uid": "9ff0830e-042d-472c-ad0d-25a356c7d544"
            },
            "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
        }
    ],
    "kind": "List",
    "metadata": {
        "resourceVersion": ""
    }
}

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ cat domain-cert.yml 
apiVersion: v1
data:
  tls.crt: 
  tls.key: 
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2022-08-05T15:11:39Z"
  name: domain-cert
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "2063253"
  uid: 9ff0830e-042d-472c-ad0d-25a356c7d544
type: kubernetes.io/tls

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl delete secret domain-cert
secret "domain-cert" deleted
erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl get secrets 
No resources found in default namespace.

erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl apply -f domain-cert.yml
secret/domain-cert created
erohin@erohin-VirtualBox:~/kubespray$ kubectl get secrets 
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      2s
```
